page.title: 11CHILDREN'S LEISURE TIME
page.content: We did a survey of children's playing time in our village. Most of them play either near their own house or in a friend's house. Lots of children play with toys. some of their favourite toys are {skipping ropes, bikes, computers and {Connect 4,}a game where you drop counters into slots, four in a row wins. Nearly all the children watch television and over half the children have a video machine. Favourite programes are{Dr.Who},about a man who goes back and foward in a time machine,{cartoons, Knight Rider}a man who captures law breakers using his computerised car and{Grange hill}is a story about a Comprehensive school. Children go out the village to the Hudson sports centre for swimming and roller skating.
